website_summaries.verdict: This all-natural hemp oil works well for ailing cats.
pros: For cats with arthritis or other ailments, this solution eases pain and anxiety
Can easily be put over food or given directly with the dropper
One of the less expensive USDA certified organic anxiety relief solutions available
cons: Though the image shows 3 bottles, only one is included

customer_reviews.title: My dog Harry
customer_reviews.text: Harry will be 18 this year and has hip joint pain this hemp oil has been amazing at helping him with moving around on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dryja

customer_reviews.title: IBD and Seizures
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used this brand but was pleased to see the amount is twice the amount of the brand I used previously and us a good value for the money. I use it for both my Bostons. On who has developed Ed loved seizures and the other has IBD from food allergies as be environmental allergies. It works well. But not sure yet as to whether it will help the one with seizures. Time will tell. It does help with the itchiness on the one with allergies as he needs a little extra help along with his normal medication.
customer_reviews.author: sharron w.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal, best product
customer_reviews.text: The big bottle gets you twice as much as competitors and works the best for our Aussie. With his separation anxiety this works the best out of 5 or so other brands we’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Castro-Conde

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this for doggie anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 14 yo partially blind and deaf shih tzu who suffers from anxiety at night. It calms her and helps her sleeps soundly.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Non GMO and organic hemp oil for cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: I mix the appropriate amount of drops in my cats wet food and they eat their food up. I started using this product to help my older female cat with her arthritic hips and anxiety from loud noises in the apartment building we just moved into. I use this product for my male cat to calm him down towards my female cat when he gets aggressive towards her and chases to jump and attack her.
customer_reviews.author: joieduvie

customer_reviews.title: Product works well for my 11 year old dog
customer_reviews.text: McKenzie was having problems getting up on certain wood or tile floors. Her back lags bothered her and she became hesitant to even attempt standing unless she was on a rug. She was not wanting to run with our Australian Shepherd. BUT One week after starting Pet Hemp Oil 2000mg she is going back to her old ways. Running with the Shepherd, barking and announcing visitor, AND getting up on all tile floors and some hardwood floors. She is happy and so are we. THANKS FOR YOUR PRODUCT that works... T J McKinney, TX
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: False reviews for reimbursement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was the most highly rated one on Amazon, unfortunately after I received it they offered me my money back just to review the product which makes me think it doesn't work. I am unsure if this is working for my dog, she has been on it for about a two weeks and I don't see a difference. Real CBD is what we are going to try next. Hemp oil isn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No Good!
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for some pain relief for my 14 year old min-pin. Caused a crisis instead. She wouldn't eat, could barely walk. The only thing it helped with was her coughing. But I can't give it to her if helping one thing makes her unable to function. Also tried on my 13 year old Corgi/Chi mix, for anxiety and barking. I swear he barked more. I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Wisegurl

customer_reviews.title: downside followup to -helps pups anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Since my original posting my dog has developed ear yeast infections. A friend had this happen but they were not giving their dog the canine hemp. My dog has only ever had the canine formula and the infection has begun. So yes while the hemp oil worked it does have its drawbacks. I am having to discontinue usage. I have a large dog that has been on prescription medication for several years due to separation anxiety. She has torn everything I own up prior to medication. This hemp oil has replaced the prescription medication entirely. The cost is half of the prescription and works every bit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE....NO SAFETY SEAL!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived fast but there is no type of safety seal around the opening nor is the bottle in any type of box outside of the shipping box. I wanted to try it on my Boston terrier because he is almost 9 years old and recently has had issues with arthritis and mobility. I was afraid to give him even a drop because the lid wasn’t on tight plus no plastic around it to let me know for sure it hadn’t been tampered with. I think this manufacturer needs to step up and take precautions because anyone could put something in the liquid. For those who reviewed this and had good results, great! I’m not taking the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Taterbug

customer_reviews.title: Helps my cat a ton!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my cat tenfold! We originally took him from our backyard. He’s a very anxious cat, scared of his own shadow kind of anxious. We always wanted to help relieve his anxiety but didn’t know how. I stumbled upon this product on Amazon and decided to try it out. We can visibly see the difference! In situations where he would’ve took off at a million miles an hour, he would actually stay put. In the past he would NEVER let anyone other than our family be anywhere near him, but now in small controlled settings he’ll actually let others pet him. It’s honestly changed his life and we’re so happy to see him living a better life!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very anxious cat that is a rescue. She has separation anxiety for when I am away from home, shopping, at work, etc. She also is scared of rain and thunderstorms. This hemp oil relaxes her and brings me peace of mind while I am at work or away from home. I sprinkle it on top of the food and she eats it right up! No complaining and I think she even looks forward to it added onto her food. I have already purchased two bottles and will definitely be buying more in the future! Highly recommend for a stressed/anxious pet! It's great and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old Lab Shepherd was adopted and has always had anxiety issues to some extent. Age has led to joint issues causing her to be more sedantary. The hemp oil seems to be helping on both fronts. she is less stressed and is moving a little better. I cannot comment on the flavor as we mix it with one of her favorite canned foods. It has not been rejected at all with the oil. May try it on her dry food, which she is less enamored with, and get a reading from that.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy pooch
customer_reviews.text: Bella seems to be doing so much better. She doesn’t seem as stiff and her leg seems to not give out like before. We are very happy. Christa and Bella
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: I have not seen a difference with my dog's pain.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog that we bought this for is 12 years old and has a torn ACL, she is not a candidate for surgery to repair it, and has not responded to the steriod injections, we have heard about the many successes with CBD oils and dogs with pain so we thought we would give it a try. It has not made any difference and we have been using it for several months now. I am not sure if it is this product or if CBD oil is just not going to work for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Boyer

customer_reviews.title: It mellowed him but didn't drug him.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time today. I've got a 66 lb German Shepherd mix. He's a good boy but whines alot and gets really, really excited when he finds out we're going in the car. I have it (a full dropper) to him about an hour before we left. He was still excited to go but didn't whine nearly as much as usual. That in itself is a good thing. I will definitely buy it again and looking forward to using it when we go on walks where he'll be a little more calm.
customer_reviews.author: OCMomof5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about taste. For my cat not me. But I put it on his food and he is eating just fine. He seems to not mind it. The funny thing is after trying it on his food. He started licking a scratcher I have mounted to the wall with cat nip in it that he hasn't show any interest in since the day I put it up. So definitely something going on there. Too early to tell if it's going to help his anxiety. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: silas c.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt notice any differnece cats run from the smell
customer_reviews.text: Cats hate the smell amd taste tried holing the cats to gove it to them soon as they smelled it the cats were clawing and screaming finally got them to take it and no changes. Yes no seal. I'm not comfortable with how the dosages. The dropper needs to be better for accurate measurement. For cats sits sating 1/8th of the dropper the bottle says something different. I work in pharmacy and theres nothing concrete about dosing properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think the hemp oil would work. My mother swears by it with her dogs that have anxiety. I used it for the first time last night. One of my old dogs had a seizure and when he came out of it he was anxious and whining. He would not calm down. I gave him a dropper full of the hemp oil and he seemed to like the flavor. He was calm and went back to sleep within 10 minutes. I will always keep this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a GAME CHANGER for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: My dog lovessss this stuff and so do I! I started out putting it on his food but now we’ve progressed to me giving it to him straight out of the bottle. He’s 7.5 years old; Chow and American Bulldog mix. He has one ACL repair and his other one is currently torn and needing surgery! He also has anxiety and suffers from PTSD. This oil has been a game changer for my fur boy and me!! Reordering right now because pre covid I was able to buy the 2 pack lol, but he cannot go one ☝🏼 day without it 🙏🏼.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Calmed my cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats. One gets bladder infections when he is stressed, one marks on the walls behind the litter boxes, another picks fights. All 3 of these situations have been almost completely eliminated by putting 4 drops in the water dish every morning. They don't all seem to like the taste as slightly less water is consumed than previously, but no one is suffering dehydration. I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: 2000 mg????
customer_reviews.text: The 2000 mg bottle that I got look exactly the same size of my other brand 500 mg bottle. I am very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Details are confusing
customer_reviews.text: I used the same link for purchase again and I noticed now it said 60,000 instead of 120,000 previously purchased. However, i saw some pictures of 120,000 and the same number in the details. My disappointment comes from receiving a 60,000 bottle instead of the 120,000, for the same price I had previously paid for a 120,000. I know the that’s what the description says but please change everything to 60,000 if you don’t want to further mislead customers.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Santos

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the taste, dropper does not fill to 1ml line.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the taste, straight into their mouths easy! My 2 yo boxer took a nice long nap after his first dose which is not in his nature lol. Just started the 9 yo on it too. She has arthritis. Too soon to tell if it's working or not. Not thrilled with the dropper, does not fill up to the 1ml line which is the dosage. Other than that, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Decreased seizures and anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old 90 lb Lab has been plagued with anxiety and seizures since she was a puppy. She was getting worse, and we thought we would have to put her down. Thanks to the Hemp Oil, her anxiety has improved and her seizures are coming far less often. We are very grateful for the oil which works and is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: ATR

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Product !!
customer_reviews.text: This product was my first choice, organic ingredients, great reviews and excellent value. I have one older dog that shakes all the time, always has, As he has gotten older and now is dealing with a younger dog, he needed some relief. Have been giving him oil for 3 weeks and he is much happier and shakes quite a bit less. Also give it to the new younger dog and has calmed him down some.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cats
customer_reviews.text: Have a cat with bladder/kidney issues where she couldn't control spasms that made her leak everywhere (lost a cable box that way) and cry out in pain when going. After few months of giving this to her in her food, twice a day, she has full control and doesn't cry out in pain from going. The other one has epilepsy and is taking medication for it. She would still have seizures until I started giving this to her, and it no longer is happening. It also seems to help with hairballs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for anxious and injured beloved dog
customer_reviews.text: My boxer/blue heeler has frequent strains on her back leg from chasing squirrels and I bought this to help alleviate that pain instead of rushing to my vet every other month and it has helped extraordinarily. She also suffers from separation anxiety and it has even helped with that. I am very pleased with this product and how helpful it has been to her quality of daily life. She isn't droopy or extra sleepy either, but she is still young. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tethyka

customer_reviews.title: No more anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Our dog Suzy suffers from anxiety we were hesitant on trying traditional drug therapies. I wanted to try to find a homeopathic solution to her anxiety and in my research I found this product one of the reviews had prompted me to order it and try it. I am not disappointed in any way shape and form this is an amazing product she loves to taste and within the first day I had seen positive changes in her. it has been now two weeks since she's been using this she's calmer, happier, and less anxious. I will recommend this product to anyone in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Hemp oil for cats and dogs 2000mg
customer_reviews.text: My dog has an injured tendon on toe which she limps on. After an hour she wasn’t limping as much.
customer_reviews.author: Bozone

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cats flaky fur.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with my cats dandruff. She eats mainly kibble. She does eat little amounts of wet food to give her some variety in her diet plus she loves wet food. Her coat looks great except noticed dry flakes on it. Within two weeks or so of daily use of this product, she doesn't have flakes on her fur. This is the purpose of why I bought it and it appears to have been the solution. I also have a dog I will be using it for different reasons. I don't have the information yet to write of this.
customer_reviews.author: T Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: Miracle worker for elderly dogs with joint pain and limitations. We were veery close to putting down our 13 year old cocker when he could no longer climb stairs. We tried CBD oil and overnight he improved. I strongly recommend this treatment - with my vet’s approval - to any pet parent of an older animal with joint issues. He’s ever back to slowly chasing bunnies!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my elderly dogs. One has started to have some small seizures and my other arthritis. Both seem to be doing great on it and I’m on my third bottle. It made them a little drowsy at first but that didn’t last. The seizures have stopped and the other seems to have a lot more agility since being on this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I have five dogs and my house is crazy(as I’m sure you can imagine). Two of my dogs have severe anxiety and have been on trazodone, but I decided to try this for New Years since nothing was really working well enough to chill them out with fireworks and this calmed them down so much. They barely noticed them and I was able to calm them down so much faster. They’re still active, but just calm down a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Johana

customer_reviews.title: No relief
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 lb Boston Terrier that is afraid of thunder & heavy rain storms. I purchased this to help her during the Florida rainy season. I have tried various amounts of doses and no relief. I also tried to give her the oil 30 minutes before the storms start and the product still did not work. I dld leave feedback to the seller asking for a refund and never received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Arntz

customer_reviews.title: 15 year old Husky
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you about flavor, but I will say my Husky will be 15 next month and have been using this oil for a year! He gets around pretty good for a dog his age, I put some on Cheerios in the morning along with a dash of cinnamon and milk and some on his cookies at dinner time. Hope you have as good a luck who ever reads this review!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Helps pets with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 older dogs (rescues) with severe anxiety over a number of issues. I've tried several versions of CBD oil and I have found that the Kinpur Pet Hemp Oil 12000 MG has been helpful to them and they have shown signs of calmness without being groggy and they seem to tolerate the dose without any issues at all. I am excited that I have finally found something that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes & smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: Animals wont even get close to it after first try. Cant hide in or under even the yummiest, juiciest of morsels. Put it on kitty paw hoping she'd lick it off, but, nope. Suggest finding a better option. Needs to taste better and smell better. Do not recommend unless you plan on forcing down fur babies throat
customer_reviews.author: Tsmith

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dog who suffers from severe anxiety when left home alone. She was a pregnant shelter dog picked up on the street 2 plus years ago. We adopted her 2 years ago and until using this hemp oil had no success finding any way to manage her anxiety. She is now managed at about 85-90% and that is after only a few weeks of using the hemp oil.
customer_reviews.author: karrat

customer_reviews.title: Where's it made?
customer_reviews.text: The claim on Amazon is that it's USA - made. On the bottle I received there is nothing anywhere on the label stating where it is made. Nada, zip. If I was selling a product made in the USA, I would feature that fact prominently on the label, for obvious reasons. Buyer beware on this product.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Makes older cats much more mobile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 4 stars only because I'm still using their 2000 mg product - when I'm out of that, I will start the 7000 mg bottle. With the 2000 mg Hemp Oil, my 17-year old cat (who had a stroke 2 years ago) is obviously in less pain, is more mobile, and while she is blind, she has coped and is happy outside ... much more so than before I started the Hemp Oil. I give her a few drops in her food once a day. She likes the taste (the beauty of Hemp Oil is that you don't have to worry about giving them too much). Taking this treatment, she is like a much younger cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Where is this made from ?
customer_reviews.text: I received my hemp oil today and no where in the bottle mentions that : 1) made in USA 2) No GMO. The bottle came without any packaging or box just bottle itself . The cap was sealed . I will give one star and if I see a reasonable explanation that this product is true to advertise I’ll change my review .
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Noticed an improvement almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: My poor old pup has been having some issues lately. Tried these drops, and I noticed a small improvement almost immediately. After a few days, his attitude was improving, he was getting up and down the stairs easier, and he was a lot more enthusiastic on his walks. He must like the flavor, too. He is definitely more enthusiastic to eat his food with these drops on it, but I don't know if it was because of the taste, or if he recognized that it was helping him. Definitely will make this a regular purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BoxManBuysStuff

customer_reviews.title: After two days, my kids asked what happened to the dog!
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a puppy and he has major anxiety, I thought I would give cbd a shot, and I ordered this. After two days, my kids asked what happened to the dog! He totally calmed down, and he stopped barking at my husband every time he walked in the room. We also started with a trainer, and I believe the combo of the cbd and the training has made a world of difference! The dog seems to like the taste, I put it on his food, or he will even let me squirt in his mouth. Def. recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F

customer_reviews.title: It's just oil - no medicinal properties like CBD
customer_reviews.text: Dog will take it on her kibbles but I researched the difference between CBD oil and Hemp oil and found that it is just oil from seeds - no medicinal value but has vitamins and omega oils. Not what the reviews or ad indicated. I needed something for seizure support. Should have researched first.
customer_reviews.author: joy happens

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husky suffers from seizures (genetic disorder) and I have used this for him for the past several months and he hasn’t had once since. He acted like he didn’t like the taste for a while, but I think he’s used to it now. I would highly recommend this to any and everyone! I will continue to buy this for as long as I have my husky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog extremely sick
customer_reviews.text: We had to make an emergency visit to the vet after giving this to my dog. I would definitely research before purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our Belgium Malinios / Shepherd Mix is a 145lbs of anxiousness. He is afraid of storms & fIreworks to the extreme he busted through a glass door. As a last resort to prescription pills I gave this a try & IT WORKED!!! He loves the taste & it has made a huge difference in his daily life as well as curbing his anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: ARTGRL

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd is losing all control of his rear legs. HEMPCARES Pet Hemp Oil really helps him with pain. He is able to do more as far as going for walks, being with the family, etc. since taking the product. I mix it with his food and he eats just as he always has with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my cats feel with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for my cat who suffers from seizures. Since I started giving her this hemp oil, she has seized much less frequently. Also, have started giving this to my 17 year old Persian cat. He has more energy and is eating better.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hajek

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Golden Retriever 13, who has cancer. It helps with pain and comfort. His sibling died 8 months ago with cancer as well. And a cat. He has been grieving from the loss of his friends. This oil has helped him tremendously. It is fairly priced. I am pleased with this product. He is a more active dog now. Although he still misses his friends, for he has lost 5 in the past year or so. He is the remaining Golden out of four.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Mom

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cost and the strength of this hemp oil is what drew me to order it. It smells decent, unlike another type I ordered, and my mom's geriatric arthritic dog readily took it from the dropper. This made more difference in her quality of life over any of the 22 pills she took daily to combat her pain. I'm sorry I didn't look into this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just added my 2nd dog because so much relief with my first dog
customer_reviews.text: Update, we've started our 6 year old on it now too. 1 week in, hair is softer. Hoping it resolves her skin allergies. Sophie, our 14 year old has been having a hard time progressively. We started this at night about 2 weeks ago now. I noticed a difference in her sleep the first night. She was able to get comfortable quicker. She didn't pace around the room before laying down for sleep. She woke up less during the night, and she slept for 4 hours longer. Now we have been using for 2 weeks and she is currently still sleeping better, longer in duration, and wakes to go potty less.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Michele

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping my old Lab's arthritis so I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: This product has seemed to help my old Black Lab's arthritis and she also seems to be moving a little better. I will keep using it and would recommend it. I want to add that their customer service is amazing. I received a bottle and it had been broken in shipment. I reached out and was immediately shipped a new bottle.
customer_reviews.author: dwskwared

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product with my kitty. She was a new adoption for me and was restless/anxious probably from being in a new environment. My biggest complaint was that she would wake up at night and be very loud and disruptive and wake me up. I started giving her the recommended dose mixed with her food at night and it seems to be helping! She seems calmer and less anxious/restless. I definitely am not getting woken up as much during the night anymore, although I can still hear her once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Nervous Cat
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, one is older and arthritic and the younger is always skiddish. We started giving them this three or four times a week and we have been able to tell a buff difference in both of them. We mix this in with their wet food and they never notice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sick dog
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 1 year old German Shepherd to help with his anxiety and chasing his tail,but it only made him sick. At first I was in sure if it was just nerves from going back to a dog park and having diarrhea. But the next day I came home from work and he's extremely lathargic, puking every where, has diarrhea, and super gassy. This is only after the 2nd dosage. Do not give this to your dogs!
customer_reviews.author: anna fisk

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. My dogs are up there in age. I started putting this on their food when I travel with them and seen a difference with the energy level. It helped them to chill in the car and run around like puppies. Purchased a few times
customer_reviews.author: NNNN

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my Boxer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for two reasons. First was for pain due to Arthritis. When a horrible storm came to my town Buddy was overly frighten from the thunder and lighting. But having three trees on top of my house he became terrified of any storm. This helps him to relax.
customer_reviews.author: janet Wozny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I thought our 14 yr old lab wouldn’t make it another month... at best. Limping, struggled walking, etc. We were rather sad. It’s literally 7 months later and NO limping. He gets up and down on his own. There is NO other treatment change, so we’re positive it was the hemp oil. Our lab is getting close to 15 yrs old now and quality of life is still excellent. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet CBD so far
customer_reviews.text: My cousins dog has been taking hemp oil to combat her anxiety and pain from her old age. This CBD oil has helped her eat and play again more so than with plain Hemp oil. Before all of this she shook all day and would barely eat.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give my dog who is afraid of thunder, fireworks, etc. I usually give her 1/2 of a dose daily, and if storms are coming I give her another half dose. Now she just sleeps through a storm! I am also seeing that her coat is softer and shinier. I don't think this was indicated, but I don't think it's a coincidence. I love this product and plan on keeping her on it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene DeHaven-Damron

customer_reviews.title: Bichon Frise healed.
customer_reviews.text: My Baby is a 7 yr old Bichon Frise, who has a tendency for hip and joint problems. He was in pain this week and I purchased 500,000 Pet Hemp Oil, after giving it to him for a couple of days he was doing his Bichon blitz and running after the Amazon truck. I truly believe in the healing powers of Hemp.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Best product ive tried yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 10.5yr old german shepherd. I rescued her about 6 months ago and she has terrible seperation anxiety. I mix 1ml in with her morning breakfast and it keeps her calm until I get home. Overall I would reccomend it if you have an anxious dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tinkey loves it!! I just use the dropper and put some on top of her food and she just gobbles it down :) It helps calm her down and keeps her from licking her paws!
customer_reviews.author: ErikaTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hemp oil works wonders, our cat was very anxious and get easily aggressive with strangers, bitting and scratching. After using the Hemp oil, she is different cat, calm. The strangers don't bother her anymore. Love it, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a 12 year old cat that was in really bad shape. I have been using hemp oil for two months and she has done a remarkable recovery. She doesn’t limp any more and she has gained weight. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: zena8430

customer_reviews.title: I have a happy dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog was diagnosed with two torn ACL‘s and the only thing that they said was going to be $4000 per knee for surgeries so we opted to do medication that didn’t work and made him sick so we are babying it and also using this hemp oil! We love it he’s like a whole new dog he loves to eat his food now yes he’s not 100% but we were having to pick up his hind legs just to get him out of the house and now he can actually run and come up the stairs and he’s has a better attitude so thankful for this product I will purchase it again thank you
customer_reviews.author: PDD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Our aging Beagle started showing signs of arthritis, limping somedays, especially when it is cold. We began giving her Hemp oil for dogs/cats and she is like a puppy again. We love this product and so does our baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: Help for a elder dog
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my 13 1/2 year old GSD manage her arthritis pain. She's still moving slowly but with much less discomfort now.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Transier

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pup calm while we're away
customer_reviews.text: Our new dog is an anxious mess when left home alone, and this (so far) has been the only thing to help keep him calm during the day. He's still a total spazz, but doesn't try to chew his way out of the house 😊 Stocking up on this for sure
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my dog’s itchy skin. The first alarming thing I noticed was the odor- it smells like skunk or weed... I have definitely bought hemp oil previously that had no odor. The stench would’ve been nice to know about as I apply it topically to my dog. Claims organic but actual label on bottle does not have a USDA seal... seems sketch- I regret buying this considering there are no refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old dog has difficulty standing and cries when he gets up. This product allows him to move with much less pain and his tail is wagging again. I recommend this with anyone who’s dog suffers from arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Silverthreads

customer_reviews.title: Calms Cat Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My cat has really bad anxiety. She was constantly on edge and would hiss, scratch and bite guests. I started giving her this every day mixed in with her food (alone she hates it) and she is a completely different cat. She is calm, and happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life safer for 14 year old poodle.
customer_reviews.text: I started my 14 year old poodle on this product and it has made a world of difference. He runs around like a puppy and no longer wines to jump on or off furniture due to pain. He loves the taste as well. I will keep this in stock for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sassyintx

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite product! My dog suffers a lot of mental health issues, including ADHD (severe) and panic attacks. He got issue with his knee joints as well (dislocated knee cups since birth). This oil helps calm him down and his joints are much better;he doesn’t limp!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help my dogs with allergies, but it didn’t do anything for them. I tried this before trying actual CBD oil. The CBD oil turned out to be more effective. My dogs loved the taste though.
customer_reviews.author: Grill

customer_reviews.title: Works for my dogs seizures.
customer_reviews.text: This oil works great for my dogs seizures and it's very reasonably priced. My dog's seizures have literally gone from a couple times a week, to maybe once or twice a month. It also helps him during a seizure, as it helps bring him out of it. It also helps with his "old man joints", and eases the stiffness. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Britt House

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!  This is the 1000mg product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is labelled incorrectly. Although it shows 7000mg per bottle and 116.6 mg per serving, when it arrives the servings only have 33.3mg per serving. I originally purchased the 5000mg at 81mg per serving for my arthritic dog. It worked good but I wanted to up the dosage a bit so moved to the 7000mg bottle. After giving her 2 doses, she was limping and in pain again. As I looked at the bottle I realized the discrepancy in the dosages. I went back to the 5000mg and she was better the next day. Returning all the 7000mg bottles as they are all wrong.
customer_reviews.author: zamp

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 yo female Rottweiler with the dreaded hip problems. I tried this just by luck. Good thing I did, it has really helped my 100lb baby girl. An upgraded bed and this hemp oil has really perked her up.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stone

customer_reviews.title: Hope for Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: The dosage-marked dropper is easy for distributing the oil to my pet. My dog has arthritis and I’m hoping this might relieve his shoulder pain. So far he seems more alert and happier but he is still favoring his leg. My dog will take his dose without a hassle so the flavor must be tasty, as well. I am hopeful that this will help with pain and restricted movement!
customer_reviews.author: PT Karla

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really helps my senior doggo
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old dog hates the taste but after hiding it in something, I see a huge change. Instead of laying around all the time she seems to want to get up and be more frisky. As long as it makes her more comfy that’s all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with allergies, itching and anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog's severe allergies to use instead of Prednisone. So far it seems to be working really well! It not only decreases her itching, but it's decreased her anxiety and hyperactive behaviors. I started this oil without much hope and I'm really pleasantly surprised. Our dog is going on 14 years old, I only wish we had found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: My pet is much more energized and is less anxious when I have to leave her for work
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hemp Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked amazingly on my dog. She was a rescue and has a lot of anxiety. The kinpur hemp oil is the only product that has shown to give her any relief. She lives the way it takes. Her tail wags when we pull it out. I would definitely recommend this product. I have shared some with family and friends pets, with their permission of course, and they absolutely love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my cat wouldn't take
customer_reviews.text: It was torture to try to give this to my older cat. I gave up since I felt I was hurting him more by trying to give this to him than the relief he was getting from what I could get in him. He also threw it up. Not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Biek

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great size of bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! The size of the bottle is a good exchange for your money. My dog just takes it right from the little squirt thing it comes with. But she’s not very picky. She likes everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: My dogs thrive on this oil!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs are elderly and have joint problems. This hemp has been great to get the one dog from limping and hobbling around. His him is so deteriorated that it just pops out of the joint.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Helped Murphy
customer_reviews.text: Murphy is a 10 year old beautiful silver lab. He has had surgery on both back legs approximately 5 years ago and has arthritis. The CBD has helped the pain, still hear cracking of course but he seems to have more energy and his coat has gotten shinier and softer which that was a bonus. Will most likely keep him on it as long as he is with us. Have taken him off the Rimadyl which is a big plus as we were concerned about liver damage. Anyway, he is happy and is still smiling and so are we.
customer_reviews.author: K. Royal

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs and 1 grand dog and I gave it to all of them and they love it. It keeps them calm and my oldest one moves slowly but when he gets this he gets a hep in his step. Idk if he might be in pain and it relieves it. This stuff is great and I will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Did not calm my dog in any way.
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. I bought it to calm my hyper poodle and help keep her from barking at "air"! It did nothing to help this problem. She didn't like the taste even in good dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Page

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly pets.
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yo you poodle gobbles it up. It really seems to mellow her out. She is frustrated by recent blindness and I suspect arthritis pain as she's not as mobile as she once was. The oil turns my cranky fuss pot into a calm and happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn YTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. I have re-ordered a few times as it has significantly improved the quality of life for my 15yr old yorki-poodle. Before using this he would hardly move, but now he is up and walking all the time. He seems happy, healthy and motivated again.
customer_reviews.author: sarahmh4

customer_reviews.title: I use it with my 2 year old shepherd
customer_reviews.text: My dog has no pain. He’s just a hyper/nervous German shepherd and I have noticed a slight difference in his temperament but it’s only been a couple weeks. Looking forward to seeing how it works long term (:
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my dog very very much!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is almost 14 years old and has trouble walking and is in a lot of pain. This product has helped her a lot. She’s able to move around a lot better when using this oil and it reduces her limping a lot! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for doggy arthritis
customer_reviews.text: My dog Rufus is given hemp oil to ease his arthritic pain and to calm his old man grumpy attitude. We see a difference in him since starting hemp oil. He’s more agile and playful.
customer_reviews.author: occnur

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER USED THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: AFRAID TO GIVE TO MY DOG I THREW IT AWAY WITHOUT USING
customer_reviews.author: Shug

customer_reviews.title: She likes it and it makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help with my chihuahua’s seizures. I am able to drizzle it on top of her kibble. It makes a difference. I forgot to add it and she had multiple episodes within a few days she free feeds so it took a few days. I immediately added it and have not seen any since. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brezyb

customer_reviews.title: Helped with dog anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This product helped with my dogs’ (three rescues) separation anxiety and stopped the insesant barking at neighbors walking on the sidewalk. Definitely will buy again- Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Aston

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: Works good and helps dogs with seizures and pain relief for arthritis. We have three dogs and two have seizures. This dramatically reduces the quantity to less than once a month. Our third dog has pain relief due to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stejskal

product_meta.title: Hemp Oil for Dogs & Cats - 60 000mg - Anxiety Relief for Dogs & Cats - Pet Hemp Oil - Supports Hip & Joint Health - Grown & Made in USA - Natural Relief for Pain - Omega 3, 6 & 9
feature_bullets: RELIEVES ANXIETY AND STRESS: Our hemp oil for pets has powerful anti-inflammatory properties, which have shown to help relieve joint pain and achieve more mobility, agility and energy
VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED: Our natural hemp oil for dogs and cats provides a natural calming effect, helps to relieve stress, travel issues, constant barking, aggressive behavior, arthritis pain

MADE IN THE USA: Our pet hemp oil drops are made by certified hemp manufacturer in the USA safeguarded by the highest manufacturing standards in the world. It's made for small, medium, large dogs and cats
NATURAL HEALTH SUPPORT: utilizing a proprietary extraction process, dog hemp oil s offers the purest possible hemp oil with a full plant profile.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS - We extract our Hemp oil for pets only from high quality. Rest assured that your pup won’t nosh on toxins or Agriculture by-products
